pkgmetadata.longdescription: Goodness-of-Fit Tests for Functional Data // Implementation of several goodness-of-fit tests for functional data. Currently, mostly related with the functional linear model with functional/scalar response and functional/scalar predictor. The package allows for the replication of the data applications considered in Garca-Portugus, lvarez-Libana, lvarez-Prez and Gonzlez-Manteiga (2021) doi:10.1111/sjos.12486.
